name: Oreo Milkshake
description: A creamy and dreamy Oreo Milkshake with the perfect ratio of Oreos to ice cream.
directions: Combine ice cream, milk, and 4 Oreo cookies in a blender.
Blend until pourable and pour into a glass.
Crush one more Oreo cookie in your hand.
Add the pieces to the the top of your shake,add a straw, and enjoy!
NOTE:Use 1/2 cup milk for a thicker shake, 3/4 for a thinner one.
